name: merchant-wallet-sdk
description: Merchant Wallet sdk for interact with firovm

scripts.test:setup: [ ! -d .firovm ] && tar xfv firovm.tar || echo '.firovm directory already exists'
scripts.test:it: yarn test:setup && docker compose -f docker-compose.test.yml up --build it-test
scripts.test:down: rm -rf .firovm && docker compose -f docker-compose.test.yml down -v && yarn rm:dangling
scripts.rm:dangling: if [ -n "$(docker images -f "dangling=true" -q)" ]; then docker rmi $(docker images -f "dangling=true" -q); else echo "No images found"; fi
